Patrick van Staveren
Contact Projects Web Log

This is the personal site of Patrick van Staveren. I work for Mintel, running our IT Infrastructure team. I grew up in Michigan, studied as a software developer with a B.S. in Computer Science from Western Michigan University and worked as a developer for 5 years in Chicago before moving around the globe and eventually landing as a manager of system administrators. I spent a few years living in Shanghai and London while working for Mintel and now live back in the suburbs of Chicago. I dabble in photography, and I’m usually happiest when I’ve been on my bicycle all day long.

If you are trying to get in touch, check out the contact page!
